page.title: 02Crow Hall Farm, Burwell
page.content:
The farm is 180 acres. The farmer grows these crops: wheat, barley, potatoes, peas, sugar beet, rape. He plants potatoes most. The machinery used for potatoes is Potato Topper and Potato Coverer. He uses nitrogen, phosphate and potash on his potatoes.
His second crop is autumm wheat. He uses a weed-killer, non Nitrogen O2424, for stopping weeds and thistles crawling up the wheat. He also uses Trip Turbo. He is going to harvest his wheat in October and his barley at the end of July.
He stores his grain in bins which each hold 50 tonnes.
